CustomField.formula: /* 2 SUBSTITUTE is way to remove trailing comma "Kystvejen 42, Kastrup, " to "Kystvejen 42, Kastrup" */ SUBSTITUTE ( SUBSTITUTE ( IF (ISBLANK(Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.FirstName),NULL,Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.FirstName + " ") + Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.LastName + ", " + IF (ISBLANK(Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingStreet),NULL,Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingStreet + ", ") + IF (ISBLANK(Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingCity),NULL,Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingCity + ", ") + IF (ISBLANK(Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingState),NULL,Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingState + ", ") + IF (ISBLANK(Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingPostalCode),NULL,Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingPostalCode + ", ") + IF (ISBLANK(Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingCountry),NULL,Vehicle__r.Pickup_Location__r.MailingCountry + ", ") /* added some specific charactes to detect last trailing comma */ + ".*.", ", .*.", NULL), ".*.", NULL)
CustomField.label: Vehicle pickup location
